title: Introducing: Trap House Collective
body:
Despite all it’s hype, grandeur and commercial success, **Drake’s** _**Take Care**_ was one of my favourite LP’s of last year, and the influence of the Canadian artist is clearly stamped across these two debut tracks from Austin group **Trap House Collective**.

Presumably taking their name from the title of **Gucci Mane’s** debut record, I can’t find out too much about the group, with their [bandcamp](http://traphousecollective.bandcamp.com/album/body-language-pt-1-songs-for-the-back-seat) page all I’ve been able to unearth. The two tracks up on said page are extremely promising R’n’B numbers, with the immaculate _Don’t Let Me Go_ being my particular favourite with its slick sample and introspective verses. With both tracks listed under the title **_Body Language Pt.1: Songs For The Backseat_** indicating that there’s more to come; I’m extremely excited to hear the rest of the cuts set to feature on the release. Check out both tracks available so far below.
